document_data.caption: A map showing Roadkeep (labeled #1) in Yhaunn.
document_data.name: Roadkeep
document_data.mainbody: The '''Roadkeep''', which was once called '''Castle Narnbra''', was a small gate castle located in the city of [[Yhaunn]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Location: The Roadkeep was found on the northwest perimeter of the city where [[Tildaryn's Ride]] and the [[East Way]] entered Yhaunn. It sat within the greater complex of the [[Road Gate]].
document_data.Activities: In addition to serving as a defensive structure, the Roadkeep was also a guard barracks, jail, treasury, and it even contained several apartments for select visitors..
